tool_description: Complete chess game reference server. Search 10 million + games, bookmark , add notes and tags, store and retrieve private games and much more.
name: Chess Game Reference
title: Chess Game Reference

api_list.name: game
api_list.description: Get the game details for the given game id.

api_list.name: search

optional_parameters.name: yearop
optional_parameters.description: "=" or ">=" or "<=". Used as the operator while filtering based on year

optional_parameters.name: result
optional_parameters.description: Get the games with this result. e.g. 1-0 for white win, 0-1 for black win 1/2-1/2 for a draw

optional_parameters.name: player1_color
optional_parameters.description: The color of the piece the first player is playing.  black or white

optional_parameters.name: player2_color
optional_parameters.description: The color of the piece the second player is playing. black or white

api_list.name: random
api_list.description: Get a random game from the chess.gallery database.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chess.p.rapidapi.com/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chess.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://chess.p.rapidapi.com/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chess.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: player_search

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Name of the player. Partial names are allowed.

api_list.name: pgn
api_list.description: Get the PGN (Portable Game Notation) for the given game id.
